title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Detailed gathering and documentation of the project requirements, including: types of gases to be detected (methane, propane, butane etc.), pipeline infrastructure details (type, age, location), sensor specifications (sensitivity, response time, power consumption etc.), data transmission protocols (MQTT, CoAP, LoraWAN etc.), user interface needs (mobile app, web dashboard, SMS alerts etc.), data storage and processing requirements (cloud-based, on-premise, real-time analysis etc.), system integration requirements (with existing pipeline management systems), security and compliance requirements (data encryption, GDPR, FERC etc.), scalability and performance requirements (number of sensors, geographical coverage etc.), and any additional specifications or constraints.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the sensor network topology, data communication protocols, data processing pipeline, and integration with existing infrastructure.

title: Develop Sensor Hardware and Firmware
description: Design and develop the gas sensor hardware and firmware, including sensor calibration, data acquisition, and communication protocols.

title: Implement Data Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the data processing pipeline, including data ingestion, preprocessing, storage, and analysis components.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for monitoring and managing the gas leak detection network, including visualization of sensor data and alerts.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures for the system, including data encryption, access controls, and secure communication protocols.

title: Set up Testing and Deployment Infrastructure
description: Set up the testing and deployment infrastructure, including continuous integration, testing environments, and deployment pipelines.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive system testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the system meets the requirements and functions as expected.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the gas leak detection network system to the production environment and set up monitoring and maintenance processes.
